page.title: 19COMMUNITY COUNCIL ACTIVITIES
page.content: They had to run round the outside of the village for five miles. The children ran for two miles on the playing field. Everyone who took part got a medal. PLAYING FIELD FETE Every year in June the fete is held on the playing field. A little ring is roped off and this is for the children from the school to do their plays or songs. There are races and there is a fancy dress competition. There are about twenty-five different stalls. You can have pony rides and there is face painting. There is a car boot sale too. They set out some tables and chairs and you can have refreshments which are made in the pavillion on the playing field.
